description: Ready in just 20 minutes, these souvlaki wraps are a brilliant midweek dinner. Enjoy succulent lamb paired with Greek salad and garlic sauce.
keywords: Souvlaki wrap,Quick & easy dinner,Lamb,Weeknight dinner,Dinner Made Easy
name: Souvlaki Wraps With Garlic Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook lamb strips, in batches, for 3 minutes, turning, or until browned. Transfer to a bowl.
Heat a greased chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook bread, one at a time, for 30 seconds on each side, or until lightly charred. Transfer to a plate. Cover to keep warm.
Meanwhile, prepare salad according to packet instructions.
Using half of the sauce, spread a little over each bread. Top with a little salad and lamb. Drizzle with remaining sauce. Fold to enclose filling. Serve with remaining salad.
